docs.snippet: Although the wool textile business has shown signs of recovery, price difficulties at the raw commodity level inject a note of uncertainty into the picture. Prices of raw wool, it was pointed out last week, have fallen below the Government support...
docs.lead_paragraph: Although the wool textile business has shown signs of recovery, price difficulties at the raw commodity level inject a note of uncertainty into the picture. Prices of raw wool, it was pointed out last week, have fallen below the Government support level.

headline.main: Wool Textile Manufacturers Back Action To Stabilize Market for Raw Fibers Here; MOVE MADE TO AID RAW WOOL MARKET

docs.snippet: LA PAZ, Bolivia, May 4 -- American risk capital is not waiting for United States recognition of the National Revolutionary Movement Government before heeding President Victor Paz Estenssoro's invitation for private exploitation of Bolivia's...
docs.lead_paragraph: LA PAZ, Bolivia, May 4 -- American risk capital is not waiting for United States recognition of the National Revolutionary Movement Government before heeding President Victor Paz Estenssoro's invitation for private exploitation of Bolivia's underground wealth.

docs.snippet: As a Bolivian citizen I have followed with natural interest your news and comments on the recent events in Bolivia. I must confess I cannot understand why disparaging terms are invariably used to qualify the ideas and aims of the political party led...
docs.lead_paragraph: As a Bolivian citizen I have followed with natural interest your news and comments on the recent events in Bolivia. I must confess I cannot understand why disparaging terms are invariably used to qualify the ideas and aims of the political party led by Victor Paz Estenssoro.

headline.main: Bolivia Under M.N.R.; Victory Is Attributed to Popular Revolt Against Military Junta

docs.snippet: The Canadian dollar last week suffered its sharpest setback since the upward movement began several months ago when it crossed parity with the American dollar for the first time since 1939. In the interval, it had risen to a premium of 2 3/16 cent,...
docs.lead_paragraph: The Canadian dollar last week suffered its sharpest setback since the upward movement began several months ago when it crossed parity with the American dollar for the first time since 1939. In the interval, it had risen to a premium of 2 3/16 cent, established on April 4.

headline.main: FOREIGN EXCHANGE RATES; Week Ended May 9, 1952
SHIPPING -- MAILS; ALL HOURS GIVEN IN DAYLIGHT SAVING TIME

docs.snippet: The foreign exchange market ran along parallel lines with stocks last week, although normally neither are on a comparable level. In foreign remittances it was reasoned that so far as British sterling and the Canadian dollar were concerned each had...
docs.lead_paragraph: The foreign exchange market ran along parallel lines with stocks last week, although normally neither are on a comparable level. In foreign remittances it was reasoned that so far as British sterling and the Canadian dollar were concerned each had reached relative stability at this time and present interest lies only in completing routine requirements. In stocks domestic political factors were cited as the explanation of the slowdown.

headline.main: FOREIGN EXCHANGE RATES; Week Ended May 16, 1952

docs.snippet: UNITED NATIONS, N. Y., May 21 -- Over vehement protests from the Soviet Union, Czechoslovakia and Poland, admission of Spain to the United Nations Educational, Scientific and Cultural Organization was approved today by the Economic and Social...
docs.lead_paragraph: UNITED NATIONS, N. Y., May 21 -- Over vehement protests from the Soviet Union, Czechoslovakia and Poland, admission of Spain to the United Nations Educational, Scientific and Cultural Organization was approved today by the Economic and Social Council, 12 votes to 5, with one abstention, Libya and Nepal were endorsed by acclamation.
docs.abstract: ECOSOC admits Libya and Nepal; Spain accepted over protests of USSR, Czech and others; Polish repr charges Vice Pres Barkley forecast US support

headline.main: SPAIN IS APPROVED FOR UNESCO SEAT; Backed by Economic Council Over Soviet Bloc Protest -- Libya and Nepal Unopposed

byline.original: Special to THE NEW YORK TIMES

docs.snippet: Brazil's draft indebtedness rose $17,900,000 last month to a new high of $160,600,000, according to the monthly report on Latin American export credit, issued yesterday by the Federal Reserve Bank of New York. For Latin American countries other than...
docs.lead_paragraph: Brazil's draft indebtedness rose $17,900,000 last month to a new high of $160,600,000, according to the monthly report on Latin American export credit, issued yesterday by the Federal Reserve Bank of New York. For Latin American countries other than Brazil the report showed aggregate draft payments rose only 0.4 per cent.

headline.main: BRAZIL TRADE DEBT AT RECORD LEVEL; Rise Is $17,900,000 in April to $160,600,000, New High -- Other Latin Payments
